_sText:
Hello,

This is a map I started well over a year ago. I took a break from hammer for awhile, and I didn't have any plans to return to mapping at the time. But since my schedule started cooling down, I decided to come back to finish this.

This is a 2 staged map that combines surf and bhop. The original idea was inspired by sinsane2 b3. I wanted to make a much easier version of that, but design it to where you keep your speed between each section. It's pretty confusing, so I would recommend watching a replay of the map before trying it out.

The map contains 4 bonuses. Bonus 4 was made last minute, and there's no teleporter to get to it. In this bonus there's a single ramp, which you loop until you have enough speed to get to the end.

Due to the fact that you can prehop sections as much as you want, this map is a little hard to tier. But I'd say it's around tier 3.
